column1: In which year did India get independence from Britain?;1;1947
The ancient Egyptians used to sleep on pillows made of:;2;Iron
Where was John F. Kennedy assassinated in?;2;New York
Which general famously stated 'I shall return'?;2;George Patton
American involvement in the Korean War took place in which decade?;1;1950s
The Magna Carta was published by the King of which country?;3;France
The first successful printing press was developed by this man.;3;Sir Isaac Newton
The Hundred Years War was fought between what two countries?;1;France and England
This man wrote a document known as the 95 Theses.;3;Henry David Thoreau
Who was the first Western explorer to reach China?;3;Magellan
